title: The best Labor Day TV sales 2021: 4K TV deals from Best Buy, Walmart and Amazon
author: mackenzie-frazier
summary: Labor Day TV sales are live - see today's best deals
article: The Labor Day TV sales event is officially underway with incredible deals on a range of 4K TVs from retailers like Best Buy, Walmart, and Amazon, and prices starting at just $159.99. To help you find all the top offers in one place, we've created this guide with all the best Labor Day TV sales for you below. You'll find summer clearance prices on last year's sets as well as record-low prices on newer models, so whether you're looking for a budget HD TV or a premium OLED, our Labor Day TV sales guide will have you covered. We've also included a standout Labor Day TV deal of the day and today's bargain is the Insignia 65-inch 4K Fire TV that's on sale for just $499.99 and includes a free Echo Dot. See the best Labor Day TV sales below, and keep in mind, most offers end tonight, so if you see a price you like, we recommend taking advantage now before it's too late.
